Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllergui

Class ActivateProductionController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllergui.ActivateProductionController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUIController, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ActivateProductionController
extends java.lang.Object
implements GUIController, javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class represents the controller of the activate production scene of the GUI application. Implements GUIController and Initializable interface.
Author:
Stefano Fossati
See Also:
GUIController, Initializable

    • drawProduction

      public void drawProduction​(java.util.ArrayList<javafx.scene.image.Image> devPlayer, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> deposit, java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> strongBox, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> additionalDeposit, java.util.ArrayList<LeaderCardToClient> leaderCardsActive)
      Displays the development cars of the player, the leader cards additional production and the sum of all resources of the player.
      Parameters:
      devPlayer - The developments card available of the player.
      deposit - The deposit of the player.
      strongBox - The strongbox of the player.
      additionalDeposit - The additional deposit of the player
      leaderCardsActive - The leader cards active of the player.

    • done

      public void done​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Creates all the structure that represents the production that the player choose to activate and send them to the connection with the server. Finally change the scene into the player view scene.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event of the type ActionEvent.
